original_text: From there he went up to Peniel and made the same request of them, but they answered as the men of Sukkoth had.
korean_text: 거기서 브누엘로 올라가서 그들에게도 그같이 구한즉 브누엘 사람들의 대답도 숙곳 사람들의 대답과 같은지라

sentences.original_text: From there he went up to Peniel
and made the same request of them
as the men of Sukkoth had
